home.headline: Generate brandable names with AI
home.sub: Keywords in. Brand-ready names out — Fast. Unique. Available-domain friendly.
home.empty: No names yet — generate some ideas!

about.title: About Nexir
about.p1: Nexir is an AI-powered brand naming studio built for founders, creators, and teams. By combining intelligent keyword analysis with real-time domain availability, Nexir helps you discover distinctive, brand-ready names faster—so you can move from idea to identity with confidence.
about.v1: Clarity: Nexir focuses on relevance, memorability, and intent—not endless, generic options.
about.v2: Originality: Fresh ideas without sounding random.
about.v3: Speed: Great options in seconds, not days.
about.ceoQuote: “Nexir is built to empower builders at every stage with intelligent naming tools that transform ideas into clear, credible, and ownable brands—without friction, guesswork, or wasted time.”
about.missionBody: To help founders turn ideas into clear, credible, and ownable brand identities—fast.
about.visionBody: To become the most trusted AI naming companion for builders worldwide.

card.domainHint: Click “Find available domains” to check .ai, .io, .app and more.
